name: Tosculi Warrior
description: A small humanoid with exceptional agility and a lawful evil alignment, the Tosculi Warrior uses its speed and flight effectively in combat.
memorable: Its ability to paralyze opponents and extend the paralysis makes it a formidable foe, especially when operating in groups.
goals: To incapacitate foes and protect its hive through coordinated attacks with other Tosculi.
relations: Often found with other Tosculi, particularly in groups supporting a Hive Queen.
environment: Typically encountered in hive-like structures or dark underground areas.
strengths: High dexterity grants remarkable agility and accuracy, while special abilities enhance combat effectiveness.
weaknesses: Moderate strength and intelligence limit its physical might and mental capabilities.
attacks: Employs deadly claw and stinger attacks, with the stinger potentially poisoning and paralyzing its target.
most_powerful_ability: Prepare Host, which can extend paralysis for up to 8 hours, rendering targets vulnerable.
senses: Has Hive Sense to locate its hive queen within 300 feet, enhancing its strategic awareness.
additional_information: Crowd Tactics grants advantage on attack rolls when sharing space with another Tosculi.
Can execute multiattacks to maximize damage output.
Utilizes flight to navigate the battlefield effectively.
Has a noteworthy Constitution score that contributes to its resilience.
Capable of debilitating foes with poison and paralysis.
test_queries: small humanoid that uses poison attacks
agile creature with tactical flying abilities
warrior that paralyzes foes for hours
Tosculi with stinger attack and hive connections
lawful evil warrior skilled in cooperative combat
